channel.title: Worried. =S
channel.description:
I am wanting to host and make a server but i am worried about people hacking me.
What is the chance of getting hacked? also Which is safer no-ip or ham because with no-ip you open the port in your firewall. [i dont really want to do that]
so please can some one say how much chance ther is of getting hacked.
Thank you in advance.
P K J00

item.title: Worried. =S
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

It says the IP of that Hamachi network. Notice how they all start with 5? If someone hacked that IP, they would be attacking the Hamachi server, not your computer.

Read full topic

item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

ok thank you for that. Also I think that your server is the best lol i also wanted to know who the owner of kingshits was.

But on hamachi it says your ip?

item.title: Worried. =S
item.dc:creator: @thug_life thug life
item.description:
@thug_life wrote:

because how are they going to get your ip?
1.they dont have a comnds like ::checkip
2.they cant see your ip anywere
i had my own server for about 6 months now name is kingshits.no-ip.info but the first ip i had was zamscape.no-ip.org and i havnt got hacked

Read full topic
